titleInfo.title: A constructive proof of the coding theorem for discrete memoryless channels with feedback
Transactions of the Sixth Prague Conference on Information Theory, Statistical Decision Functions, Random Processes: held at Prague, from September 19 to 25, 1971

bibliographicCitation.apa: Ahlswede, R. (1973). A constructive proof of the coding theorem for discrete memoryless channels with feedback. In J. Kozesník (Ed.), Transactions of the Sixth Prague Conference on Information Theory, Statistical Decision Functions, Random Processes: held at Prague, from September 19 to 25, 1971 (pp. 39-50). München: Verl. Dokumentation [u.a.].
